sentences.en: Are you getting ready to expand or remodel your building?

sentences.en: Do not disassemble or remodel the unit. This can cause electric shock, personal injury or fire.
sentences.cn: 不要拆卸或改装本机. 这可以引起触电 、 人身伤害或火灾.

sentences.en: I'll remodel the downstairs bedroom first.

The airport terminals have been extensively remodelled.

sentences.en: This is a major remodel. This is a disaster.

sentences.en: Workmen were hired to remodel and enlarge the farm buildings.
